Reviews.Title: Haier 24" TV
Reviews.Author: Ronald Duser
Reviews.Content: Nice television. Good sound and great picture. Fits neatly into my living room entertainment center. Very reasonable price for a quality television.

Reviews.Title: Good picture,poor sound
Reviews.Author: Martin
Reviews.Content: Very good picture,tinny and weak sound. No analog audio out without disabling TV speakers. Only 2 HDMI inputs. Very skimpy Manual.

ProductInfo.Features:
720p HD Resolution
Integrated ATSC /NTSC /QAM tuners
Multiple Audio Video inputs, including 2 HDMI and 1 USB port
Auto Volume Leveler (AVL)
Wall mountable (VESA compliant)
ProductInfo.Name: Haier 24-Inch 720p 60Hz LCD HDTV (L24B2120)
